official-title.#text:
To provide public safety officer disability benefits to officers disabled before the enactment of
			 the Federal public safety officer disability benefits law.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Disabled Public Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Disabled Public Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Disability benefits for public safety officers disabled before enactment of public safety officer
			 disability law

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1201(b) of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1201/ss:b

quote.#text: determines that a public safety officer has
, whether before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this part,

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Disabled Public
			 Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Disabled Public Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014

quote.#text:
In the case of a public safety officer seeking a benefit under the previous sentence on the basis
			 of having been permanently and totally disabled as the direct result of a
			 catastrophic injury sustained in the line of duty before the date of the
			 enactment of this part, such officer may file a claim under this
			 subsection during the same period that would be applicable to such an
			 officer so disabled after the date of the enactment of this part, except
			 that in lieu of such a period beginning on the date of the injury such
			 period shall begin on the date of the enactment of the

text.#text: by adding at the end the following new sentence:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
apply to any public safety officer alive on or after the date
			 of the enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Disabled Public Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5292 IH: Disabled Public Safety Officers Fairness Act of 2014
